name: David
aboutpara: Developed critical skills in a high-demand technical environment, focusing on network systems and cloud infrastructure. Demonstrated ability to troubleshoot complex issues and optimize system performance. Currently looking to transition into a new field (Site Reliability Engineering) where these technical and problem-solving skills can make a significant impact.

resume.tagline: üëã  I'm an aspiring Site Reliability Engineer.
resume.description: I have developed critical skills in a high-demand technical environment, focusing on network systems and cloud infrastructure. Demonstrated ability to troubleshoot complex issues and optimize system performance. Currently looking to transition into a new field (Site Reliability Engineering) where these technical and problem-solving skills can make a significant impact.

experiences.position: Application Infrastrucuture Engineer at Zenith Bank Plc
experiences.bullets: Successfully led and migrated mobile banking application servers from windows to Linux leading to over 90% uptime of the mobile application , Worked with the team on the migration to the new core banking application of the bank , Manage and monitor electronic banking channels (USSD Mobile App Corporate and Retail banking Internet Banking SMS service) leading to restoration of failed services within a short period of time , Monitoring the health of each channel using Dynatrace and Grafana ensuring an uptime percentage of over 85% per day , Resolution of over 4000 users affected by licensing and email issues on Office 365 , Troubleshooting application failures by reading and interpreting logs , Provide Microsoft Office 365 Active Directory MS Exchange and Azure support , Solving teammate issues logged onto the Service Desk within specified SLA periods , Maintaining technical documents for each product/channel (document contains architecture diagram data/process flow application dependencies issue & resolution list and FAQs)

experiences.position: Graduate Trainee at Meristem Securities Limited
experiences.bullets: Maintaining solid relationships with clients through customer service and delivery , Gathering as much information on the company and participating in on-the-job training wherever possible , Participating in meetings workshops and team-building event , Compiling reports and making presentations to other staff members , Analyzing existing systems and offering new ideas for improvement , Conducting research and assisting the Manager or Supervisor wherever possible

experiences.position: DevOps Engineer Intern at Tramango Limited
experiences.bullets: Worked with public cloud services and infrastructure provisioning using AWS  Improved cloud systems functionality with automation and configuration management , Designed developed and implemented full-stack web development tools and technologies in a team-based environment , Worked on new products and updated functionality of existing software systems , Managed and maintained Netlify deployments AWS instances and Heroku deployments

education.universityPara: Bachelor's of Engineering (B.Eng) in Computer Engineering
